ability.Adaptability: This Pokemon's same-type attack bonus (STAB) is 2 instead of 1.5.
ability.Vitory Heart: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Atk and SpA will be 1.25x. The power of Aura Sphere becomes 1.3x.

Aura Sphere.effect: This move does not check accuracy.

Flash Cannon.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Explore Mind.effect: Increases the user's attack, special attack, and speed by one stage.

Close Combat.effect: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Shadow Ball.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
